attributes.action: Close the petition site, as it's a waste of time and effort.
attributes.additional_details: If the people want something implemented that the government doesn't they just ignore it, give an uninspired generic response, everybody knows this is the case. It is exceptionally patronizing to the British people take down this pointless site and redesign the system to allow the voice of the populas to be taken seriously.
attributes.background: It is a waste of time and effort to continue this facade, millions of people sign a petition and it is ignored, after the largest petition(revoke article 50) passed the 100,000 mark and rocketed up to 6 million only 6 Tories actually showed up to debate the topic.
